alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 4:41AM PST until December 13 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Wave heights 2 to 4 feet, with highest waves along north shores. * WHERE...Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
